description: This Dart source file defines an OpenAIService class that provides methods to interact with OpenAI's API for image-to-text conversion (vision) and image generation. It includes request handling with timeouts, error handling, JSON parsing, and API key management.

classes.name: OpenAIService
classes.description: A service class that facilitates communication with OpenAI APIs for vision and image generation tasks, handling HTTP requests, error management, and JSON parsing.

methods.name: imageToText
methods.description: Sends an image (via URL or base64) to OpenAI's vision API to extract text content. Supports providing instructions, setting max tokens, temperature, and handles errors with friendly messages.

methods.name: generateImage
methods.description: Uses OpenAI's image generation API to create an image from a prompt, returning its URL or base64 data. Manages HTTP requests and error handling appropriately.
